Name: Grave Keeper
About the game: You are The Bounty Hunter and walked into The Forbidden Stronghold. It is taken by The Skeleton King. To collect all treasures you must kill him first. Become a hero and fight against the biggest enemies. Fight and improve the main character to hunt down monsters, dark skeletons, mages and other villains in deepest dungeons. - Fight with enemies, beat bosses, get gold - Find new items to use in battle - Upgrade your skills and be fearless - Versus Mode - compare strength with other knights Grave Keeper is a Hack and Slash game in the fantasy world focused on the fight against The Skeleton King.
Meta Title: Grave Keeper: Mar 29, 2019, Baldur Games and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Grave Keeper? Check out the release date (Mar 29, 2019), developer insights from Baldur Games, and a complete game summary.
